title: Average regular season home attendance of the Chicago Bears 2008 to 2019
summary: In general Average attendance has stayed the same over the Year.
Average attendance is slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Average attendance, about 62035.0 was reported at Year 2015
The lowest Average attendance, of value 60368.0 was reported at Year 2016
min_summary: Overall Average attendance has decreased over the Year.
Average attendance is slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016.
